long_description: Built to help sustain your riding routine even in bad weather, the Castelli Narcisista bike shoe covers offer windproof protection and extra warmth thanks to high-performance fabric and construction. Waterproof polyester fabric blocks rain and wind; neoprene inserts add extra warmth to keep the cold out. Waterproof side zipper allows easy on/off over bike shoes. Castelli Narcisista bike shoe covers feature reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light.
short_description: Built to help sustain your riding routine even in bad weather, the Castelli Narcisista bike shoe covers offer windproof protection and extra warmth thanks to high-performance fabric and construction.
